attributes.action: Re-open Brenzett airfield for civil flying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
RAF Brenzett in Kent is a disused airfield that is currently used as farmland.
I think this is a shame as it would be good to see civil flying from Brenzett.
It would be popular with aviation enthusiasts and it would bring in lots of tourists to the area. Having an active civil airfield at Brenzett would be sure to give a boost to the local area.
